EmailTemplate.name: ADE.8130.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Now Available: 8130 Tag Self-Service on MyAerospace Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.honeywellaidc.com/pages/SiteLanguages.aspx]]> NEWS | Personal Protective Equipment BE SAFE.LEARN ONLINE. We are continually making it easier and faster for you to access support and do business with us. Our latest MyAerospace Portal <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/wps/portal/]]> enhancement provides you with the ability to immediately access a copy of your FAA Authorized Release Certificate (FAA 8130 tag). To comply with FAA regulations, this copy can only be accessed once.
To obtain this one-time-only copy from the MyAerospace Portal <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/wps/portal/]]>, select Order Status and then click on the selection in Other Documents.
We will continue to add other documents for download capability.
Would you like to be part of the next MyAerospace Portal enhancement? Sign up here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/myaerospace-updates]]> to participate in our next user research study and help us improve it, together.
The MyAerospace Portal <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/wps/portal/]]> provides you with 24/7 access to your repair, order and support information. Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/myaerospace-updates]]> to get the latest news. LEARN MORE <[[#]]> © 2016 Honeywell International Inc. | Privacy Policy <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/privacy-policy]]> | Terms and Conditions <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/terms-and-conditions]]>
